Deathless Ancient.name: Deathless Ancient
Deathless Ancient.text:
Flying
Tap three untapped Vampires you control: Return Deathless Ancient from your graveyard to your hand.

Desperate Castaways.flavor: A pirate crew without a ship is a crew that will do anything to get one.
Desperate Castaways.name: Desperate Castaways
Desperate Castaways.text: Desperate Castaways can't attack unless you control an artifact.

Dire Fleet Hoarder.flavor: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.
Dire Fleet Hoarder.name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
Dire Fleet Hoarder.text: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Dire Fleet Interloper.name: Dire Fleet Interloper
Dire Fleet Interloper.text:
Menace
When Dire Fleet Interloper enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Dire Fleet Ravager.flavor: His fists fume with the decay of death, each strike a plague on the hearts of his enemies.
Dire Fleet Ravager.name: Dire Fleet Ravager
Dire Fleet Ravager.text:
Menace, deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of their life, rounded up.

Duress.flavor: Solitude and starvation are brutal punishments, but even worse is all that time to think.
Duress.name: Duress
Duress.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Fathom Fleet Captain.flavor: "Join me, and take the world for yourself!"
Fathom Fleet Captain.name: Fathom Fleet Captain
Fathom Fleet Captain.text:
Menace
Whenever Fathom Fleet Captain attacks, if you control another nontoken Pirate, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace.

Fathom Fleet Cutthroat.flavor: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."
Fathom Fleet Cutthroat.name: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat
Fathom Fleet Cutthroat.text: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

Grim Captain's Call.flavor: When the battle is over, the bitterest foes at last find common ground.
Grim Captain's Call.name: Grim Captain's Call
Grim Captain's Call.text: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.

Heartless Pillage.name: Heartless Pillage
Heartless Pillage.text:
Target opponent discards two cards.
Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Kitesail Freebooter.name: Kitesail Freebooter
Kitesail Freebooter.text:
Flying
When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

Lurking Chupacabra.flavor: "Shadow birthed it. The moon gave it eyes, and the jungle gave it teeth. But it was Death that taught it cruelty." —Huatli
Lurking Chupacabra.name: Lurking Chupacabra
Lurking Chupacabra.text: Whenever a creature you control explores, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

March of the Drowned.name: March of the Drowned
March of the Drowned.text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return two target Pirate cards from your graveyard to your hand.

Mark of the Vampire.flavor: "Through your sacrifice of self, you become holy. Through your strength, all will be saved." —From the Rite of Redemption
Mark of the Vampire.name: Mark of the Vampire
Mark of the Vampire.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

Queen's Agent.name: Queen's Agent
Queen's Agent.text:
Lifelink
When Queen's Agent enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Queen's Bay Soldier.flavor: The soldiers of the Legion of Dusk have come to the colonies at Queen's Bay in search of glory and riches. They are veterans of centuries of warfare, and they thirst for conquest.
Queen's Bay Soldier.name: Queen's Bay Soldier

Raiders' Wake.flavor: One was spared to tell the gruesome tale.
Raiders' Wake.name: Raiders' Wake
Raiders' Wake.text:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.
Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.

Revel in Riches.name: Revel in Riches
Revel in Riches.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

Ruin Raider.name: Ruin Raider
Ruin Raider.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's converted mana cost.

Ruthless Knave.flavor: "This scum is barely worth the trouble."
Ruthless Knave.name: Ruthless Knave
Ruthless Knave.text:
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.

Sanctum Seeker.flavor: The Sanctum Seekers were the first of the knightly orders to cross the sea and are still the most zealous.
Sanctum Seeker.name: Sanctum Seeker
Sanctum Seeker.text: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Seekers' Squire.name: Seekers' Squire
Seekers' Squire.text: When Seekers' Squire enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Skittering Heartstopper.flavor: It flows like water over the forest floor, as deadly as the swiftest current.
Skittering Heartstopper.name: Skittering Heartstopper
Skittering Heartstopper.text: {B}: Skittering Heartstopper gains deathtouch until end of turn.

Skulduggery.flavor: "They're so much more willing to parley once they're hanging from a boom by the ankle!"
Skulduggery.name: Skulduggery
Skulduggery.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.

Skymarch Bloodletter.flavor: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.
Skymarch Bloodletter.name: Skymarch Bloodletter
Skymarch Bloodletter.text:
Flying
When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Spreading Rot.flavor: "What is this foul presence that defies the sun's cleansing rays?" —Itzama the Crested
Spreading Rot.name: Spreading Rot
Spreading Rot.text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

Sword-Point Diplomacy.flavor: "Take my blood if you want. Just don't take my gold!"
Sword-Point Diplomacy.name: Sword-Point Diplomacy
Sword-Point Diplomacy.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. For each of those cards, put that card into your hand unless any opponent pays 3 life. Then exile the rest.

Vanquish the Weak.flavor: The clerics known as condemners punish those who do not recognize the righteous authority of the church.
Vanquish the Weak.name: Vanquish the Weak
Vanquish the Weak.text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

Vicious Conquistador.flavor: "He is ambitious. Tireless. And utterly ruthless. Ideal for the frontier." —Viceroy Elia Sotonores, report to the queen
Vicious Conquistador.name: Vicious Conquistador
Vicious Conquistador.text: Whenever Vicious Conquistador attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

Vraska's Contempt.flavor: It wasn't long before the taverns of High and Dry were full of whispers about the new captain who could turn a person to stone with a glance.
Vraska's Contempt.name: Vraska's Contempt
Vraska's Contempt.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

Walk the Plank.flavor: When Captain Thorn adds a new ship to his fleet, he gives the crew a simple choice: follow me, or fall in the sea.
Walk the Plank.name: Walk the Plank

Wanted Scoundrels.flavor: "Trust me. The reward's not worth it."
Wanted Scoundrels.name: Wanted Scoundrels
Wanted Scoundrels.text: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Angrath's Marauders.flavor: Captain Angrath cares less about treasure than mayhem. If he can't leave Ixalan, he'll burn the plane down.
Angrath's Marauders.name: Angrath's Marauders
Angrath's Marauders.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

Bonded Horncrest.flavor: "You don't tame a horncrest. You convince it that it's easier to destroy something else." —Amautl, knight of Atzocan
Bonded Horncrest.name: Bonded Horncrest
Bonded Horncrest.text: Bonded Horncrest can't attack or block alone.

Brazen Buccaneers.name: Brazen Buccaneers
Brazen Buccaneers.text:
Haste
When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Burning Sun's Avatar.flavor: "Tilonalli's searing rays carry the spark of life's eventual destruction as all light fades." —Chitlati, Lightning Rider
Burning Sun's Avatar.name: Burning Sun's Avatar
Burning Sun's Avatar.text: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and 3 damage to up to one target creature.

Captain Lannery Storm.name: Captain Lannery Storm
Captain Lannery Storm.text:
Haste
Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Captivating Crew.flavor: "We sail. We plunder. Then we dance."
Captivating Crew.name: Captivating Crew
Captivating Crew.text: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

Charging Monstrosaur.flavor: "I knew I should have stayed with the boat. Always stay with the boat!"
Charging Monstrosaur.name: Charging Monstrosaur

Demolish.flavor: What took months for human hands to carve took just seconds for the dinosaur's tail to ruin.
Demolish.name: Demolish

Dinosaur Stampede.flavor: If you're in the way of a ceratops charge and you're made of mere flesh and bone, then you're not really in the way.
Dinosaur Stampede.name: Dinosaur Stampede
Dinosaur Stampede.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn. Dinosaurs you control gain trample until end of turn.

Dual Shot.flavor: "Through me the rage of Tilonalli burns twice as bright."
Dual Shot.name: Dual Shot
Dual Shot.text: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.

Fathom Fleet Firebrand.flavor: As she charges into battle, her arcane tattoos stir and crawl like fiery serpents.
Fathom Fleet Firebrand.name: Fathom Fleet Firebrand
Fathom Fleet Firebrand.text: {1}{R}: Fathom Fleet Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Fiery Cannonade.flavor: Wary of the ferocious dinosaurs, the Legion of Dusk built up the walls of their fort—just in time for the pirates to burn them down.
Fiery Cannonade.name: Fiery Cannonade
Fiery Cannonade.text: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.

Fire Shrine Keeper.flavor: Though grimed with the dust of centuries, the ancient shrine was not unguarded.
Fire Shrine Keeper.name: Fire Shrine Keeper
Fire Shrine Keeper.text:
Menace
{7}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Fire Shrine Keeper: It deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.

Firecannon Blast.flavor: Goblins' fearlessness and diminutive size make them the perfect cannoneers.
Firecannon Blast.name: Firecannon Blast
Firecannon Blast.text:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage to that creature instead if you attacked with a creature this turn.

Frenzied Raptor.flavor: Sun Empire warriors are taught to emulate the fearless raptors that fling themselves against towers of horn and muscle a hundred times their size.
Frenzied Raptor.name: Frenzied Raptor

Headstrong Brute.flavor: "Watch your backs, keep your blades at hand, and let the orc go first!" —Captain Brandis Thorn
Headstrong Brute.name: Headstrong Brute
Headstrong Brute.text:
Headstrong Brute can't block.
Headstrong Brute has menace as long as you control another Pirate.

Hijack.flavor: Trapped on Ixalan, the Planeswalker Angrath is the only minotaur sailing the seas. No matter how many ships he captures, he cannot break free.
Hijack.name: Hijack
Hijack.text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

Lightning Strike.flavor: "Storm on the horizon, cap'n!" —Grick Doobin, last words
Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

Lightning-Rig Crew.flavor: A pirate ship in battle is a storm of activity.
Lightning-Rig Crew.name: Lightning-Rig Crew
Lightning-Rig Crew.text:
{T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.

Makeshift Munitions.flavor: "Grease up a firecannon good and proper with dinosaur-liver oil, and it'll shoot just about anything."
Makeshift Munitions.name: Makeshift Munitions
Makeshift Munitions.text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.

Nest Robber.flavor: "These sailors on our shores are like the dinosaurs that plunder eggs from nests. They live on the labors of others." —Itzama the Crested
Nest Robber.name: Nest Robber

Otepec Huntmaster.flavor: "Forward! Let the Burning Sun's light guide you to deserving prey!"
Otepec Huntmaster.name: Otepec Huntmaster
Otepec Huntmaster.text:
Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Target Dinosaur gains haste until end of turn.

Rampaging Ferocidon.flavor: All raptors are aggressive, but ferocidons seem to enjoy their prey's pain.
Rampaging Ferocidon.name: Rampaging Ferocidon
Rampaging Ferocidon.text:
Menace
Players can't gain life.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

Raptor Hatchling.flavor: "Every little hatchling has a parent's claws to guard it." —Sun Empire saying
Raptor Hatchling.name: Raptor Hatchling
Raptor Hatchling.text: Enrage — Whenever Raptor Hatchling is dealt damage, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

Repeating Barrage.name: Repeating Barrage
Repeating Barrage.text:
Repeating Barrage deals 3 damage to any target.
Raid — {3}{R}{R}: Return Repeating Barrage from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you attacked with a creature this turn.

Rigging Runner.flavor: The hook makes him feel brave, and the hat makes him feel fancy.
Rigging Runner.name: Rigging Runner
Rigging Runner.text:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.

Rile.flavor: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.
Rile.name: Rile
Rile.text:
Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.

Rowdy Crew.name: Rowdy Crew
Rowdy Crew.text:
Trample
When Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

Rummaging Goblin.flavor: Goblins' eager curiosity leads them to scavenging, petty theft, and the rigging of sleek pirate ships. Some stop at scavenging.
Rummaging Goblin.name: Rummaging Goblin
Rummaging Goblin.text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

Star of Extinction.flavor: "The visions haunt me. I see the end of the world, brought on by the search for the Immortal Sun." —Shaper Pashona
Star of Extinction.name: Star of Extinction
Star of Extinction.text: Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

Storm Fleet Arsonist.flavor: "Go ahead, build another. I'll burn that down as well."
Storm Fleet Arsonist.name: Storm Fleet Arsonist
Storm Fleet Arsonist.text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Arsonist enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent sacrifices a permanent.

Storm Fleet Pyromancer.name: Storm Fleet Pyromancer
Storm Fleet Pyromancer.text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.

Sun-Crowned Hunters.flavor: One alone is dangerous, and they are never alone.
Sun-Crowned Hunters.name: Sun-Crowned Hunters
Sun-Crowned Hunters.text: Enrage — Whenever Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, it deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

Sunbird's Invocation.name: Sunbird's Invocation
Sunbird's Invocation.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a card revealed this way with converted mana cost X or less without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Sure Strike.name: Sure Strike
Sure Strike.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

Swashbuckling.flavor: The pirates of the Brazen Coalition are the descendants of those displaced by the Legion of Dusk, and they are eager for vengeance.
Swashbuckling.name: Swashbuckling
Swashbuckling.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.

Thrash of Raptors.flavor: They glide through the undergrowth, drawn to sounds of disturbance. They attack in unison and all share in the kill. And then they move on.
Thrash of Raptors.name: Thrash of Raptors
Thrash of Raptors.text: As long as you control another Dinosaur, Thrash of Raptors gets +2/+0 and has trample.

Tilonalli's Knight.flavor: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Tilonalli is the Burning Sun, associated with ferocity, fire, and passion.
Tilonalli's Knight.name: Tilonalli's Knight
Tilonalli's Knight.text: Whenever Tilonalli's Knight attacks, if you control a Dinosaur, Tilonalli's Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Tilonalli's Skinshifter.flavor: "I am the ferocity of the Burning Sun. I am hide and feather, fang and claw."
Tilonalli's Skinshifter.name: Tilonalli's Skinshifter
Tilonalli's Skinshifter.text:
Haste
Whenever Tilonalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.

Trove of Temptation.name: Trove of Temptation
Trove of Temptation.text:
Each opponent must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature each combat if able.
At the beginning of your end step, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Unfriendly Fire.flavor: Disputes within the Brazen Coalition can escalate from insult to broadside in the blink of an eye.
Unfriendly Fire.name: Unfriendly Fire
Unfriendly Fire.text: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to any target.

Spitfire Bastion.flavor: Now instead of a ship, Ripley Vance commands a fortress.
Spitfire Bastion.name: Spitfire Bastion
Spitfire Bastion.text:
(Transforms from Vance's Blasting Cannons.)
{T}: Add {R}.
{2}{R}, {T}: Spitfire Bastion deals 3 damage to any target.

Vance's Blasting Cannons.flavor: With a broadside assault, Captain Vance carved the cliffs to form her new home.
Vance's Blasting Cannons.name: Vance's Blasting Cannons
Vance's Blasting Cannons.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast that card this turn.
Whenever you cast your third spell in a turn, you may transform Vance's Blasting Cannons.

Wily Goblin.flavor: Goblins climb and swing with ease, whether through a pirate ship's rigging or a tree's branches.
Wily Goblin.name: Wily Goblin
Wily Goblin.text: When Wily Goblin enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Ancient Brontodon.flavor: It is taller than all but the tallest trees, and older than all but the oldest.
Ancient Brontodon.name: Ancient Brontodon

Atzocan Archer.flavor: His arrows are fletched with feathers from the greatest of the winged dinosaurs.
Atzocan Archer.name: Atzocan Archer
Atzocan Archer.text:
Reach
When Atzocan Archer enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Blinding Fog.flavor: "I see you, shiny soldiers, but you won't see me."
Blinding Fog.name: Blinding Fog
Blinding Fog.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Blossom Dryad.flavor: The only force on Ixalan not interested in finding the golden city is Ixalan itself.
Blossom Dryad.name: Blossom Dryad

Carnage Tyrant.flavor: Sun Empire commanders are well versed in advanced martial strategy. Still, the correct maneuver is usually to deploy the giant, implacable death lizard.
Carnage Tyrant.name: Carnage Tyrant
Carnage Tyrant.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Trample, hexproof

Colossal Dreadmaw.flavor: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.
Colossal Dreadmaw.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
Colossal Dreadmaw.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Commune with Dinosaurs.name: Commune with Dinosaurs
Commune with Dinosaurs.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Crash the Ramparts.flavor: The Legion's conquistadors could endure Ixalan's sun. Their forts could withstand a charging ceratops. But nothing can stop a ceratops strengthened by the sun.
Crash the Ramparts.name: Crash the Ramparts
Crash the Ramparts.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

Crushing Canopy.flavor: "Do not mistake your lofty vantage point for safety." —Shaper Tuvasa
Crushing Canopy.name: Crushing Canopy
Crushing Canopy.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.

Deathgorge Scavenger.name: Deathgorge Scavenger
Deathgorge Scavenger.text: Whenever Deathgorge Scavenger enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, you gain 2 life. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, Deathgorge Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Deeproot Champion.flavor: "No good will come from what you seek. Turn back now or suffer an ignoble death far from your home."
Deeproot Champion.name: Deeproot Champion
Deeproot Champion.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.

Deeproot Warrior.flavor: "We breathe from our soul and bones to give strength to the jungle. The jungle breathes from its roots and rivers to give strength to us." —Shaper Falani
Deeproot Warrior.name: Deeproot Warrior
Deeproot Warrior.text: Whenever Deeproot Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Drover of the Mighty.flavor: "I do not lead. They do not follow. We walk together."
Drover of the Mighty.name: Drover of the Mighty
Drover of the Mighty.text:
Drover of the Mighty gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Dinosaur.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Emergent Growth.flavor: "By accepting my smallness I am vast."
Emergent Growth.name: Emergent Growth
Emergent Growth.text: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

Emperor's Vanguard.name: Emperor's Vanguard
Emperor's Vanguard.text: Whenever Emperor's Vanguard deals combat damage to a player, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Grazing Whiptail.flavor: Often found browsing on the upper canopies of Ixalan's jungles, whiptails are known to absently bat away anything foolish enough to interrupt their meal.
Grazing Whiptail.name: Grazing Whiptail

Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun.flavor: Before the Sun Empire was born, humans and merfolk joined their magic to invoke a blessing of fertility on the land.
Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun.name: Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun
Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun.text:
(Transforms from Growing Rites of Itlimoc.)
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

Growing Rites of Itlimoc.name: Growing Rites of Itlimoc
Growing Rites of Itlimoc.text:
When Growing Rites of Itlimoc enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform Growing Rites of Itlimoc.

Ixalli's Diviner.name: Ixalli's Diviner
Ixalli's Diviner.text: When Ixalli's Diviner enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Ixalli's Keeper.flavor: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Ixalli is the Verdant Sun, who fosters growth in all things.
Ixalli's Keeper.name: Ixalli's Keeper
Ixalli's Keeper.text: {7}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Ixalli's Keeper: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

Jade Guardian.flavor: The River Heralds believe that jade gives weight to their magic.
Jade Guardian.name: Jade Guardian
Jade Guardian.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
When Jade Guardian enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

Jungle Delver.flavor: "There is no power too great to be used in the defense of our ancestral lands."
Jungle Delver.name: Jungle Delver
Jungle Delver.text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Delver.

Kumena's Speaker.flavor: "The same power that drives the river ever onward flows through the roots and branches—to me."
Kumena's Speaker.name: Kumena's Speaker
Kumena's Speaker.text: Kumena's Speaker gets +1/+1 as long as you control another Merfolk or an Island.

Merfolk Branchwalker.name: Merfolk Branchwalker
Merfolk Branchwalker.text: When Merfolk Branchwalker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

New Horizons.name: New Horizons
New Horizons.text:
Enchant land
When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
